gw.bc.approval

Interface ActivityApprovable<A extends ActivityCreatedByAppr>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - The approval activity type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractWriteOff<A>, AccountDisbursement, com.guidewire.bc.domain.disbursement.gen.AccountDisbursementStubI, AcctNegativeWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.AcctNegativeWriteoffStubI, AdvanceCmsnPayment, AgencyDisbursement, com.guidewire.bc.domain.disbursement.gen.AgencyDisbursementStubI, BonusCmsnPayment, ChargeCommissionWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.commission.gen.ChargeCommissionWriteoffStubI, ChargeGrossWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ChargeGrossWriteoffStubI, ChargeReversal, CollateralDisbursement, com.guidewire.bc.domain.disbursement.gen.CollateralDisbursementStubI, CommissionWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.commission.gen.CommissionWriteoffStubI, Credit, CreditReversal, Disbursement, FundsTransfer, FundsTransferReversal, GrossWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.GrossWriteoffStubI, ItemCommissionWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ItemCommissionWriteoffStubI, ItemGrossWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ItemGrossWriteoffStubI, NegativeWriteoff, NegativeWriteoffRev, ProdNegativeWriteoff, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ProdNegativeWriteoffStubI, ProducerPayableTransfer, ProdWriteoffContainer, com.guidewire.bc.domain.accounting.gen.ProdWriteoffContainerStubI, SuspenseDisbursement, com.guidewire.bc.domain.disbursement.gen.SuspenseDisbursementStubI, Writeoff, WriteoffReversal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RawWriteOffTransactionView

    public interface ActivityApprovable<A extends ActivityCreatedByAppr>
    Defines the interface for entities that have activities generated for approvals. Logically, this extends the Approvable delegate, but since delegates cannot be extended nor can they include an array, this is defined separately and applied to the BC entities that should have this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A getOpenApprovalActivity()
      Looks up and returns, if any, the open approval activity for this activity approvable.
      A initiateApprovalActivityIfUserLacksAuthority()
      Initiates an approval activity if the current user lacks authority to approve any excess limits.

    • Method Detail

      • initiateApprovalActivityIfUserLacksAuthority

        A initiateApprovalActivityIfUserLacksAuthority()
        Initiates an approval activity if the current user lacks authority to approve any excess limits. The approval status will be set to either unapproved or approved based on whether approval is required.
        Returns:
        The approval activity, or null if no approval is required.

      • getOpenApprovalActivity

        A getOpenApprovalActivity()
        Looks up and returns, if any, the open approval activity for this activity approvable.
        Returns:
        The open approval activity or null if none.
